controls.name: Ensure Security Defaults is enabled on Microsoft Entra ID
controls.description: Security defaults in Microsoft Entra ID make it easier to be secure and help protect your organization.
controls.rationale: Security defaults provide secure default settings that we manage on behalf of organizations to keep customers safe until they are ready to manage their own identity security settings.
controls.audit: From Azure Portal: Navigate to Microsoft Entra ID > Properties > Manage Security defaults
controls.remediation: Enable Security Defaults in Microsoft Entra ID Properties
controls.impact: Users and admins will be required to register for and use MFA

controls.name: Ensure Multi-factor Authentication is Required for All Users
controls.description: Enable multi-factor authentication for all users in the Microsoft Entra ID.
controls.rationale: Multi-factor authentication requires an individual to present a minimum of two separate forms of authentication before access is granted.
controls.audit: Review Conditional Access policies or Security Defaults status
controls.remediation: Enable Security Defaults or create Conditional Access policy requiring MFA
controls.impact: All users will need to configure and use MFA

controls.name: Ensure Multi-factor Authentication is Required for Administrative Roles
controls.description: Ensure that all users with administrative roles are required to use multi-factor authentication.
controls.rationale: Administrative accounts are high-value targets for attackers.
controls.audit: Review Conditional Access policies targeting administrative roles
controls.remediation: Create Conditional Access policy requiring MFA for admin roles
controls.impact: Administrators will need to use MFA for all sign-ins

controls.name: Ensure Trusted Locations Are Defined
controls.description: Microsoft Entra ID Conditional Access allows an organization to configure Named locations.
controls.rationale: Defining trusted locations helps in identifying legitimate user access patterns.
controls.audit: Navigate to Microsoft Entra ID > Security > Conditional Access > Named locations
controls.remediation: Define named locations for trusted networks

controls.name: Ensure Guest Users Are Reviewed on a Regular Basis
controls.description: Microsoft Entra ID allows you to invite external users into your tenant.
controls.rationale: Guest users should be reviewed regularly to ensure external access is still appropriate.
controls.audit: Review guest user list in Microsoft Entra ID > Users > Guest users
controls.remediation: Establish a regular review process for guest users

controls.name: Ensure Access Reviews Are Configured for Guest Users
controls.description: Configure access reviews to periodically review guest user access.
controls.rationale: Automated access reviews help ensure guest access is continuously validated.
controls.audit: Navigate to Identity Governance > Access reviews
controls.remediation: Create recurring access reviews for guest users
controls.impact: Requires Azure AD Premium P2 license

controls.name: Ensure Self-Service Password Reset Is Enabled
controls.description: Allow users to reset their own passwords without administrator intervention.
controls.rationale: Reduces helpdesk burden and allows for faster recovery from compromised passwords.
controls.audit: Navigate to Microsoft Entra ID > Password reset
controls.remediation: Enable self-service password reset for all or selected users
controls.impact: Users can reset their own passwords

controls.name: Ensure Custom Banned Password List is Set
controls.description: Configure a custom banned password list to prevent weak passwords.
controls.rationale: Custom banned passwords prevent organization-specific weak passwords.
controls.audit: Navigate to Microsoft Entra ID > Security > Authentication methods > Password protection
controls.remediation: Add custom banned passwords relevant to your organization
controls.impact: Users cannot use listed banned passwords

controls.name: Ensure Privileged Identity Management Is Used to Manage Roles
controls.description: Use Azure AD Privileged Identity Management (PIM) to manage privileged roles.
controls.rationale: PIM provides just-in-time privileged access and reduces standing privileges.
controls.audit: Navigate to Microsoft Entra ID > Privileged Identity Management
controls.remediation: Enable PIM and configure eligible role assignments
controls.impact: Requires Azure AD Premium P2 license

controls.name: Ensure Global Administrator Count Is Minimized
controls.description: Limit the number of users assigned the Global Administrator role.
controls.rationale: Global Administrators have unrestricted access and should be limited.
controls.audit: Review users with Global Administrator role
controls.remediation: Reduce Global Administrators to 2-4 users maximum

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for Cloud Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for Cloud to get a unified view of security across Azure resources.
controls.rationale: Defender for Cloud provides security recommendations and threat protection.
controls.audit: Navigate to Microsoft Defender for Cloud > Environment settings
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for Cloud plans

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for Servers Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for Servers for server workload protection.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection and vulnerability assessment for servers.
controls.audit: Check Defender for Servers plan status
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for Servers plan

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for App Service Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for App Service.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection for web applications.
controls.audit: Check Defender for App Service plan status
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for App Service plan

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for SQL Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for SQL databases.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection and vulnerability assessment for SQL.
controls.audit: Check Defender for SQL plan status
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for SQL plan

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for Storage Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for Storage accounts.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection for storage account activities.
controls.audit: Check Defender for Storage plan status
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for Storage plan

controls.name: Ensure Microsoft Defender for Key Vault Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for Key Vault.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection for Key Vault access patterns.
controls.audit: Check Defender for Key Vault plan status
controls.remediation: Enable Defender for Key Vault plan

controls.name: Ensure Security Contact Email Is Set
controls.description: Configure security contact email for Defender for Cloud alerts.
controls.rationale: Ensures security alerts are sent to appropriate personnel.
controls.audit: Navigate to Defender for Cloud > Environment settings > Email notifications
controls.remediation: Configure security contact email addresses

controls.name: Ensure Automatic Provisioning of Monitoring Agent Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable automatic provisioning of the monitoring agent.
controls.rationale: Ensures consistent monitoring across all VMs.
controls.audit: Check auto-provisioning settings in Defender for Cloud
controls.remediation: Enable auto-provisioning for monitoring agents

controls.name: Ensure Secure Transfer Required Is Set to Enabled
controls.description: Enable secure transfer for storage accounts.
controls.rationale: Ensures data is encrypted in transit using HTTPS.
controls.audit: Check 'Secure transfer required' setting on storage accounts
controls.remediation: Enable secure transfer required for all storage accounts

controls.name: Ensure Storage Account Default Network Access Is Set to Deny
controls.description: Configure storage account network access to deny by default.
controls.rationale: Restricts storage account access to specific networks.
controls.audit: Check storage account firewall settings
controls.remediation: Set default network access to Deny and configure allowed networks

controls.name: Ensure Private Endpoints Are Used to Access Storage Accounts
controls.description: Use private endpoints for storage account access.
controls.rationale: Private endpoints provide network isolation for storage access.
controls.audit: Check for private endpoint connections on storage accounts
controls.remediation: Configure private endpoints for storage accounts

controls.name: Ensure Storage Logging Is Enabled for Blob Service
controls.description: Enable diagnostic logging for blob service.
controls.rationale: Provides audit trail for blob access.
controls.audit: Check diagnostic settings for blob service
controls.remediation: Enable diagnostic logging to Log Analytics or storage

controls.name: Ensure Public Access Level Is Disabled for Storage Accounts
controls.description: Disable blob public access on storage accounts.
controls.rationale: Prevents anonymous access to blob data.
controls.audit: Check 'Allow Blob public access' setting
controls.remediation: Disable blob public access on storage accounts
controls.impact: Anonymous blob access will be blocked

controls.name: Ensure Minimum TLS Version Is Set to 1.2
controls.description: Set minimum TLS version to 1.2 for storage accounts.
controls.rationale: TLS 1.0 and 1.1 have known vulnerabilities.
controls.audit: Check minimum TLS version setting
controls.remediation: Set minimum TLS version to 1.2

controls.name: Ensure Soft Delete Is Enabled for Blobs and Containers
controls.description: Enable soft delete for data recovery.
controls.rationale: Allows recovery of accidentally deleted data.
controls.audit: Check blob and container soft delete settings
controls.remediation: Enable soft delete with appropriate retention period

controls.name: Ensure Auditing Is Set to On for SQL Servers
controls.description: Enable auditing for Azure SQL Database servers.
controls.rationale: Auditing tracks database events and writes them to an audit log.
controls.audit: Check SQL Server auditing settings
controls.remediation: Enable SQL Server auditing to storage or Log Analytics

controls.name: Ensure Advanced Threat Protection Is Set to On
controls.description: Enable Advanced Threat Protection for SQL databases.
controls.rationale: Provides threat detection for SQL databases.
controls.audit: Check Advanced Threat Protection status
controls.remediation: Enable Advanced Threat Protection

controls.name: Ensure SQL Server TDE Is Enabled
controls.description: Enable Transparent Data Encryption for SQL databases.
controls.rationale: TDE encrypts data at rest.
controls.audit: Check TDE status on databases
controls.remediation: Enable TDE on all databases

controls.name: Ensure SQL Server Firewall Rules Are Configured
controls.description: Configure SQL Server firewall to restrict access.
controls.rationale: Limits network access to SQL servers.
controls.audit: Review SQL Server firewall rules
controls.remediation: Remove overly permissive firewall rules

controls.name: Ensure SQL Server Uses Private Endpoints
controls.description: Use private endpoints for SQL Server access.
controls.rationale: Provides network isolation for SQL access.
controls.audit: Check for private endpoint connections
controls.remediation: Configure private endpoints for SQL servers

controls.name: Ensure Diagnostic Logs Are Enabled for All Services
controls.description: Enable diagnostic logging for Azure services.
controls.rationale: Diagnostic logs provide visibility into service operations.
controls.audit: Check diagnostic settings on resources
controls.remediation: Enable diagnostic settings for all applicable resources

controls.name: Ensure Activity Log Retention Is Set to 365 Days or More
controls.description: Configure Activity Log retention for at least 365 days.
controls.rationale: Provides audit trail for compliance requirements.
controls.audit: Check Activity Log retention settings
controls.remediation: Configure Activity Log to export to storage or Log Analytics

controls.name: Ensure Log Analytics Workspace Is Configured
controls.description: Create and configure Log Analytics workspace for centralized logging.
controls.rationale: Centralized logging enables better security monitoring.
controls.audit: Check for Log Analytics workspace in subscription
controls.remediation: Create Log Analytics workspace and configure log collection

controls.name: Ensure Network Security Group Flow Logs Are Enabled
controls.description: Enable NSG flow logs for network traffic analysis.
controls.rationale: Flow logs provide visibility into network traffic.
controls.audit: Check NSG flow log settings
controls.remediation: Enable NSG flow logs for all NSGs

controls.name: Ensure Security Alert Notifications Are Configured
controls.description: Configure notifications for security alerts.
controls.rationale: Ensures timely response to security incidents.
controls.audit: Check alert notification settings
controls.remediation: Configure alert notifications to appropriate email addresses

controls.name: Ensure No Network Security Groups Allow Inbound from 0.0.0.0/0 to Port 22
controls.description: Block SSH access from the internet.
controls.rationale: SSH should not be directly accessible from the internet.
controls.audit: Review NSG rules for SSH access
controls.remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP addresses or use Azure Bastion

controls.name: Ensure No Network Security Groups Allow Inbound from 0.0.0.0/0 to Port 3389
controls.description: Block RDP access from the internet.
controls.rationale: RDP should not be directly accessible from the internet.
controls.audit: Review NSG rules for RDP access
controls.remediation: Restrict RDP access to specific IP addresses or use Azure Bastion

controls.name: Ensure Network Security Groups Are Associated with Subnets
controls.description: Associate NSGs with all subnets.
controls.rationale: NSGs provide network-level access control.
controls.audit: Check subnet NSG associations
controls.remediation: Associate NSGs with all subnets

controls.name: Ensure DDoS Protection Standard Is Enabled
controls.description: Enable DDoS Protection Standard for VNets.
controls.rationale: Provides enhanced DDoS protection.
controls.audit: Check DDoS protection plan association
controls.remediation: Enable DDoS Protection Standard

controls.name: Ensure Web Application Firewall Is Enabled
controls.description: Enable WAF for web applications.
controls.rationale: WAF protects against common web exploits.
controls.audit: Check WAF configuration on Application Gateway
controls.remediation: Enable and configure WAF

controls.name: Ensure Azure Bastion Is Used for Remote Access
controls.description: Use Azure Bastion for secure remote access.
controls.rationale: Bastion provides secure RDP/SSH without public IPs.
controls.audit: Check for Azure Bastion deployment
controls.remediation: Deploy Azure Bastion for remote access

controls.name: Ensure Virtual Machines Use Managed Disks
controls.description: Use managed disks for virtual machines.
controls.rationale: Managed disks provide better reliability and security.
controls.audit: Check VM disk configuration
controls.remediation: Convert unmanaged disks to managed disks

controls.name: Ensure VM Disk Encryption Is Enabled
controls.description: Enable disk encryption for virtual machines.
controls.rationale: Disk encryption protects data at rest.
controls.audit: Check Azure Disk Encryption status
controls.remediation: Enable Azure Disk Encryption on all VMs

controls.name: Ensure VMs Do Not Have Public IP Addresses
controls.description: Avoid assigning public IP addresses directly to VMs.
controls.rationale: Reduces attack surface.
controls.audit: Check for public IP assignments on VMs
controls.remediation: Remove public IPs and use load balancers or Bastion

controls.name: Ensure Automatic OS Updates Are Enabled
controls.description: Enable automatic OS updates for virtual machines.
controls.rationale: Keeps VMs patched against vulnerabilities.
controls.audit: Check update management configuration
controls.remediation: Enable automatic updates or Azure Update Management

controls.name: Ensure Key Vault Is Recoverable
controls.description: Enable soft delete and purge protection on Key Vaults.
controls.rationale: Protects against accidental or malicious deletion.
controls.audit: Check soft delete and purge protection settings
controls.remediation: Enable soft delete and purge protection

controls.name: Ensure Private Endpoints Are Used for Key Vault
controls.description: Use private endpoints for Key Vault access.
controls.rationale: Provides network isolation for Key Vault access.
controls.audit: Check for private endpoint connections
controls.remediation: Configure private endpoints for Key Vaults

controls.name: Ensure Key Vault Logging Is Enabled
controls.description: Enable diagnostic logging for Key Vault.
controls.rationale: Provides audit trail for Key Vault operations.
controls.audit: Check diagnostic settings on Key Vaults
controls.remediation: Enable diagnostic logging to Log Analytics

controls.name: Ensure Key Expiration Is Set for Keys
controls.description: Set expiration dates on cryptographic keys.
controls.rationale: Ensures regular key rotation.
controls.audit: Check key expiration settings
controls.remediation: Set expiration dates on all keys

controls.name: Ensure Secret Expiration Is Set for Secrets
controls.description: Set expiration dates on secrets.
controls.rationale: Ensures regular secret rotation.
controls.audit: Check secret expiration settings
controls.remediation: Set expiration dates on all secrets

controls.name: Ensure App Service Uses Latest TLS Version
controls.description: Configure App Service to use TLS 1.2 or higher.
controls.rationale: Older TLS versions have known vulnerabilities.
controls.audit: Check minimum TLS version setting
controls.remediation: Set minimum TLS version to 1.2

controls.name: Ensure App Service Requires HTTPS Only
controls.description: Configure App Service to accept only HTTPS connections.
controls.rationale: Ensures all traffic is encrypted.
controls.audit: Check HTTPS Only setting
controls.remediation: Enable HTTPS Only

controls.name: Ensure App Service Uses Managed Identity
controls.description: Use managed identities for App Service authentication.
controls.rationale: Eliminates need for stored credentials.
controls.audit: Check managed identity configuration
controls.remediation: Enable system or user-assigned managed identity

controls.name: Ensure App Service Uses VNet Integration
controls.description: Integrate App Service with VNet for private communication.
controls.rationale: Provides network isolation for backend connections.
controls.audit: Check VNet integration settings
controls.remediation: Configure VNet integration
